sentences.en: Vaccination and other prophylactic measures can be carried out.
sentences.cn: 接种疫苗和其他预防措施可以实施。

sentences.en: Anyone who wants to avoid the flu should consider getting a vaccination.
sentences.cn: 任何希望避免患流感的人都应该考虑接种疫苗。

sentences.en: Now, children aged six months to five years are to be offered the vaccination from next month.
sentences.cn: 现在，年龄在六个月至五岁之间的儿童从下个月开始接种疫苗。
